Package com.example.potato1_events

Class EntEventsRepository

java.lang.Object
com.example.potato1_events.EntEventsRepository
public class EntEventsRepository extends Object
Repository class to handle entrant-related Firestore interactions.

    • setInstance

      public static void setInstance(EntEventsRepository repository)
      Sets the singleton instance of EntEventsRepository. This method is intended for testing purposes to inject a mock repository.
      Parameters:
      repository - The mock EntEventsRepository instance.

    • getAllEvents

      public void getAllEvents(EntEventsRepository.EventListCallback callback)
      Retrieves all available events.
      Parameters:
      callback - Callback to handle the list of events.

    • getEventsByIds

      public void getEventsByIds(List<String> eventIds, EntEventsRepository.EventListCallback callback)
      Retrieves events by their IDs. Handles Firestore's 'whereIn' limitation by batching the requests if necessary.
      Parameters:
      eventIds - List of event IDs to fetch.
      callback - Callback to handle the list of events.

    • getEventById

      public void getEventById(String eventId, EntEventsRepository.EventCallback callback)
      Retrieves an event by its ID.
      Parameters:
      eventId - The ID of the event.
      callback - Callback to handle the event data.

    • getJoinedEvents

      public void getJoinedEvents(String deviceId, EntEventsRepository.EventListCallback callback)
      Retrieves events that the entrant has joined.
      Parameters:
      deviceId - The entrant's device ID.
      callback - Callback to handle the list of joined events.

    • joinWaitingList

      public void joinWaitingList(String eventId, String deviceId, com.google.firebase.firestore.GeoPoint geoPoint, EntEventsRepository.ActionCallback callback)
      Adds the entrant to the event's waiting list and records their geopoint if required.
      Parameters:
      eventId - The ID of the event.
      deviceId - The entrant's device ID.
      geoPoint - The geopoint of the entrant.
      callback - Callback to handle success or failure.

    • leaveWaitingList

      public void leaveWaitingList(String eventId, String deviceId, EntEventsRepository.ActionCallback callback)
      Removes the entrant from the event's waiting list and deletes their geopoint if required.
      Parameters:
      eventId - The ID of the event.
      deviceId - The entrant's device ID.
      callback - Callback to handle success or failure.

    • updateEntrantStatus

      public void updateEntrantStatus(String eventId, String entrantId, String status, EntEventsRepository.ActionCallback callback)
      Updates the entrant's status in the event's entrants map.
      Parameters:
      eventId - The ID of the event.
      entrantId - The ID of the entrant.
      status - The new status to set.
      callback - Callback to handle success or failure.
